definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
a nonnegative number (i.e. positive or zero)

sentences.english: It's really a simple numbers game with negative and positive numbers.
sentences.chinese: 它其实就是正负数的简单数字游戏。

sentences.english: The side lines can be angled or curved, and the offset distance may be negative.
sentences.chinese: 侧线能形成角度或弧度，并且偏移距离可以是负数。

sentences.english: "The tea leaves that are falling—as sparse as they are—are falling on the negative side, " said Jim Meyer, chief investment officer at Tower Bridge Advisors.
sentences.chinese: 正如茶叶本身的稀少的一样，茶叶正下跌为负数。

sentences.english: It was a shock every time I saw minus in front of our goal difference.
sentences.chinese: 看到自己的净胜球是负数对我是一种打击。

sentences.english: And if you're below this temperature here, this quantity, p times v it would be negative.
sentences.chinese: 压强与体积的乘积将变成负数，这可能吗？

sentences.english: You have square root of minus one for something else.
sentences.chinese: 你得到了某个负数的平方根。

sentences.english: The tension can never be negative.
Does a negative floating point mantissa also with or without sign it?
sentences.chinese: 请问一个负数的浮点数的尾数还带不带符号呀？

sentences.english: Above some temperature is going to be positive, below some temperature is going to be negative.
sentences.chinese: 低于这一温度它是负数，我们一般忽略这些高阶项。

sentences.english: Then it becomes zero when I perpendicular, and then it becomes negative.
sentences.chinese: 当垂直时，它变到，然后它变为负数。

sentences.english: You also send a fault response if someone requests the square root of a negative number.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人请求负数的平方根，也将发送错误响应。

sentences.english: Compared to positive numbers, negative numbers had higher activation thresholds.
sentences.chinese: 与正数相比，负数数量表征的激活阈限更高。

sentences.english: So the negative case, of course, is exactly the opposite.
sentences.chinese: 那么对负数的情况，当然，它完全相反。

sentences.english: So this is the negative number, right?
It’s a line of negative width.
sentences.chinese: 这是一条宽度是负数的道路。

definition: to round up to the nearest integer/to discard four, but treat five as whole (of decimal points)
a nonpositive number (i.e. negative or zero)
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
a nonnegative number (i.e. positive or zero)
